SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class SDKClient

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.SDKClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class SDKClient extends Object implements Closeable
This class creates SDKClient for an extension to make requests to OpenSearch

    • initializeJavaClient

      public org.opensearch.client.opensearch.OpenSearchClient initializeJavaClient()
      Initializes an OpenSearchClient using OpenSearch JavaClient
      Returns:
      The SDKClient implementation of OpenSearchClient. The user is responsible for calling doCloseJavaClients() when finished with the client

    • initializeJavaClient

      public org.opensearch.client.opensearch.OpenSearchClient initializeJavaClient(String hostAddress, int port)
      Initializes an OpenSearchClient using OpenSearch JavaClient
      Parameters:
      hostAddress - The address of OpenSearch cluster, client can connect to
      port - The port of OpenSearch cluster
      Returns:
      The SDKClient implementation of OpenSearchClient. The user is responsible for calling doCloseJavaClients() when finished with the client

    • initializeJavaAsyncClient

      public org.opensearch.client.opensearch.OpenSearchAsyncClient initializeJavaAsyncClient()
      Initializes an OpenAsyncSearchClient using OpenSearch JavaClient
      Returns:
      The SDKClient implementation of OpenSearchAsyncClient. The user is responsible for calling doCloseJavaClients() when finished with the client as JavaClient and JavaAsyncClient uses the same close method

    • initalizeJavaAsyncClient

      public org.opensearch.client.opensearch.OpenSearchAsyncClient initalizeJavaAsyncClient(String hostAddress, int port)
      Initializes an OpenAsyncSearchClient using OpenSearch JavaClient
      Parameters:
      hostAddress - The address of OpenSearch cluster, client can connect to
      port - The port of OpenSearch cluster
      Returns:
      The SDKClient implementation of OpenSearchAsyncClient. The user is responsible for calling doCloseJavaClients() when finished with the client

    • initializeRestClient

      @Deprecated public SDKClient.SDKRestClient initializeRestClient()
      Deprecated.
      Provided for compatibility with existing plugins to permit migration. Use initializeJavaClient() for new development.
      Initializes a SDK Rest Client wrapping the RestHighLevelClient.

      The purpose of this client is to provide a drop-in replacement for the syntax of the Client implementation in existing plugins with a minimum of code changes.

      Do not use this client for new development.

      Returns:
      The SDKClient implementation of RestHighLevelClient. The user is responsible for calling doCloseHighLevelClient() when finished with the client

    • initializeRestClient

      @Deprecated public SDKClient.SDKRestClient initializeRestClient(String hostAddress, int port)
      Deprecated.
      Provided for compatibility with existing plugins to permit migration. Use initializeJavaClient() for new development.
      Initializes a SDK Rest Client wrapping the RestHighLevelClient.

      The purpose of this client is to provide a drop-in replacement for the syntax of the Client implementation in existing plugins with a minimum of code changes.

      Do not use this client for new development.

      Parameters:
      hostAddress - The address of OpenSearch cluster, client can connect to
      port - The port of OpenSearch cluster
      Returns:
      The SDKClient implementation of RestHighLevelClient. The user is responsible for calling doCloseHighLevelClient() when finished with the client

      Throws:

    • execute

      public final <Request extends org.opensearch.action.ActionRequest, Response extends org.opensearch.action.ActionResponse> void execute(org.opensearch.action.ActionType<Response> action, Request request, org.opensearch.action.ActionListener<Response> listener)
      Executes a generic action, denoted by an ActionType.
      Type Parameters:
      Request - The request type.
      Response - The response type.
      Parameters:
      action - The action type to execute.
      request - The action request.
      listener - The listener to receive the response back.
